Transaction Speed

Crypto Casinos

Crypto transactions are lightning-fast. Withdrawals typically take 10 minutes to 1 hour, depending on the blockchain and network congestion. Deposits are nearly instant. There are no third-party intermediaries to slow things down.

  • Verified average: 10‚Äì60 mins (withdrawals)

Regular Casinos (Fiat)

Payments using traditional banking tools like credit cards or wire transfers often delay your access to funds. Withdrawals can take anywhere from 3 to 7 business days, sometimes longer due to KYC checks and regional banking regulations.

Security & Privacy

Crypto Casinos: Maximum Anonymity

Using blockchain-based wallets provides top-tier encryption and ensures freedom from sharing sensitive data. Most crypto casinos either eliminate KYC or keep it optional, allowing for pseudonymous play.

  • No need to share bank or card data
  • Reduced threat from centralized data hacks
  • Source: JS13kGames, Match2Pay, DestinationBCN

Fiat Casinos: Risk of Data Breaches

These platforms are built on centralized KYC frameworks, requiring you to disclose identity documents and financial info. This centralized data model invites significant security risks.

  • High risk of personal data exposure

Most crypto casinos use provably fair algorithms that allow players to verify the outcome of their bets cryptographically. This boosts trust without relying on third-party audits.

RNG + Audits (Regular)

Traditional casinos use Random Number Generators (RNG) audited by third parties such as eCOGRA or Cura√ßao eGaming. While trustworthy, they don‚Äôt allow players to validate results independently.
